map.name: OA_ReadTotalReport
map.property: select (case when ISNULL(r.status) then 0 else r.Status end)as status,r.ReadTime,r.BillKey from oa_read r join bpm_migration m on r.BillOID=m.BillOID

map.name: OA_WFTotalReport
map.property: select UrgencyDeg,BillStatus,i.ProcessKey,i.instancestate,W.creatTime from wf_workitem w join bpm_workiteminfo bw on w.WorkitemID=bw.WorkitemID join bpm_instance i on bw.InstanceID=i.InstanceID join BPM_migration m on i.OID=m.BillOID where bw.WorkitemID IN ( select max(WorkitemID) from bpm_workiteminfo bpw GROUP BY bpw.InstanceID)

map.name: OA_DoneTolReport
map.property: select * from (select BillStatus,UrgencyDeg,i.FormKey as FormKey, i.ProcessKey as ProcessKey,w.creatTime from wf_workitem w join bpm_log l on w.WorkitemID=l.WorkitemID join BPM_Instance i on l.instanceID=i.instanceID join bpm_migration M on i.OID = m.BillOID where l.WorkitemState=2 and l.WorkitemID in(select MAX(WorkitemID) from bpm_log ll GROUP BY ll.InstanceID) and i.instancestate!=3 ) h

map.name: OA_EndTolReport
map.property: select UrgencyDeg,BillStatus,i.ProcessKey as ProcessKey,i.FormKey as FormKey,W.creatTime from wf_workitem w join bpm_workiteminfo bw on w.WorkitemID=bw.WorkitemID join bpm_instance i on bw.InstanceID=i.InstanceID join BPM_migration m on i.OID=m.BillOID where bw.WorkitemID IN (select max(ParentWorkitemID) from bpm_workiteminfo bpw GROUP BY bpw.InstanceID) and i.instancestate = 2

map.name: OA_RejectTolReport
map.property: select * from (SELECT topic,EmpID, DeptID,max(WF_Workitem.WorkitemID) as workitemid,WF_Workitem.creatTime AS creatTime,BPM_Instance.ProcessKey as ProcessKey,BPM_Instance.formkey AS formkey, BPM_Instance.oid AS oid FROM WF_Workitem JOIN BPM_Log ON WF_Workitem.WorkitemID = BPM_Log.WorkitemID JOIN bpm_workiteminfo ON wf_workitem.WorkitemID=bpm_workiteminfo.WorkitemID JOIN BPM_Instance ON BPM_Log.instanceID = BPM_Instance.instanceID join BPM_Migration on BPM_Instance.OID=BPM_Migration.BillOID WHERE BPM_Instance.OID =BPM_Migration.Billoid AND WF_Workitem.AuditResult = 0 GROUP BY topic,EmpID,DeptID,WF_Workitem.creatTime,BPM_Instance.ProcessKey ) k

map.name: OA_ToDoListTolReport
map.property: select * from (select BPM_Instance.ProcessKey as ProcessKey,BPM_Instance.formkey as formkey, UrgencyDeg,BillStatus,BillCreatTime from WF_Workitem join WF_Participator on WF_Workitem.WorkitemID=WF_Participator.WorkitemID join BPM_Log on WF_Workitem.WorkitemID=BPM_Log.WorkitemID join bpm_workiteminfo on wf_workitem.WorkitemID=bpm_workiteminfo.WorkitemID join BPM_Instance on BPM_Log.instanceID=BPM_Instance.instanceID join BPM_Migration on BPM_Instance.OID=BPM_Migration.BillOID) h

map.name: OA_WPTotalReport
map.property: Select OID,SOID,POID,VERID,DVERID,SourceBillID,No,GroupID,Week,WeekCode,DateBegin,DateEnd,Status,isPushed From (Select H.OID,H.SOID,H.POID,H.VERID,H.DVERID,H.SourceBillID,H.No,H.GroupID,H.Week,W.Code As WeekCode,W.DateBegin,W.DateEnd,H.Status,H.isPushed From OA_weeklyreport H Join OA_Week W On H.Week=W.SOID) D
